content:
New project assignment:

Optimize the synthesis parameters for a copper-based MOF (Metal-Organic Framework) to maximize surface area and gas adsorption capacity.

Objectives:
- Design synthesis protocol for Cu-BTC MOF
- Optimize temperature, pressure, and reaction time
- Characterize the resulting material
- Measure gas adsorption properties

Team, we have a new project to optimize the synthesis of Cu-BTC MOF for maximum surface area and gas adsorption capacity. I'm assigning initial tasks: Bohr and Curie, please design a baseline synthesis protocol focusing on Cu-BTC. Edison and Faraday, prepare the characterization plan (BET, XRD, SEM). Gauss, develop a gas adsorption analysis protocol (N2, CO2, CH4). Deng, once protocols are ready, you'll execute the experiments. I'll coordinate timelines and ensure safety compliance. Report back within 24 hours with your proposed plans.
